ing: 1 pound boneless beef sirloin steak or beef top round steak
1 (10.75 ounce) can  Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or Campbell'sÂ® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup
4 cups hot cooked medium egg noodles
des: "Always a family favorite, this classic dish of quickly sauteed beef and onion in a creamy mushroom sauce is perfect over hot cooked noodles. Garnish with fresh parsley for a colorful table presence and serve with a family favorite green vegetable."
ins:
Slice beef into very thin strips.
Heat half the oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Cook beef until browned, stirring often. Set beef aside.
Add remaining oil.  Add onion and cook over medium heat until tender. Pour off fat.
Add soup and paprika.  Heat to a boil.  Stir in sour cream and return beef to skillet.  Heat through.  Serve over noodles.  Sprinkle with parsley.
